nhc_headline: ...NOAA HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT FINDS A STRONGER MILTON... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING IMPACTS INCREASING FOR PORTIONS OF THE FLORIDA WEST COAST...
summary:
...NOAA HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT FINDS A STRONGER MILTON... ...RISK OF LIFE-THREATENING IMPACTS INCREASING FOR PORTIONS OF THE FLORIDA WEST COAST...
 As of 7:00 AM CDT Sun Oct 6
 the center of Milton was located near 22.6, -94.9
 with movement E at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 991 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
